title: Ubuntu 23.10 to Debut a New ‘Ubuntu Store’ Based on Flutter
description:
As things stand now, Canonical seems to be going full-steam ahead for integrating Flutter-based elements into Ubuntu 23.10.

The post Ubuntu 23.10 to Debut a New ‘Ubuntu Store’ Based on Flutter appeared first on Linux Today.

title: What’s New in COSMIC: Themes and APIs
description:
COSMIC is a new, yet-to-be-released Rust-based desktop environment for Pop!_OS and other Linux distros that is populating some base systems.

The post What’s New in COSMIC: Themes and APIs appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Debian Systems Patched Against ‘Downfall,’ ‘INCEPTION’ CPU Flaws
description:
The Debian Project released an updated kernel and intel-microcode packages for all supported Debian GNU/Linux releases. Learn more here.

The post Debian Systems Patched Against ‘Downfall,’ ‘INCEPTION’ CPU Flaws appeared first on Linux Today.

title: OpenSSH 9.4 Is a Bug-Fix Release That Adds Some New Features
description:
OpenSSH 9.4 now allows forwarding Unix Domain sockets via the “-W” option and adds support for configuration tags. Here’s what’s new!

The post OpenSSH 9.4 Is a Bug-Fix Release That Adds Some New Features appeared first on Linux Today.
